title: 269. Bad Medicine, Part 2: (Drug) Trials and Tribulations
description: How do so many ineffective and even dangerous drugs make it to market? One reason is that clinical trials are often run on "dream patients" who aren't representative of a larger population. On the other hand, sometimes the only thing worse than being excluded from a drug trial is being included.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
